sect1.title: Prerequisites
sect1.para: This book assumes that its reader has a good deal of knowledge about using and installing Linux software. Before you begin building your LFS system, you should read the following HOWTOs:

listitem.para: This is a comprehensive guide to building and installing "generic" UNIX software distributions under Linux. This HOWTO is available at .
This guide covers the usage of assorted Linux software and is available at .

This is an LFS Hint written specifically for new users of Linux. It is mostly a list of links to excellent sources of information on a wide range of topics. Any person attempting to install LFS, should at least have an understanding of many of the topics in this hint. It is available at
